3. The display device of claim 2, whereinthe first side frame covers the side surface of the first display panel and protects the first display panel, andthe second side frame covers the side surface of the second display panel and protects the second display panel.

4. The display device of claim 2, whereinat least one first protrusion part and at least one first concave part are disposed on at least one side surface of the first cabinet, andat least one second protrusion part and at least one second concave part are disposed on at least one side surface of the second cabinet.

5. The display device of claim 4, wherein the first concave part includes:a connection part; anda control part, whereinthe connection part is connected to the first side frame and movable in a direction,the connection part includes an inclined surface corresponding to the second protrusion part, andthe control part is fastened to the connection part to control movement of the connection part.
6. The display device of claim 5, wherein the control part includes a spring having elasticity.
7. The display device of claim 6, whereinthe first protrusion part protrudes toward the second concave part, andthe second protrusion part protrudes toward the first concave part.

8. The display device of claim 7, wherein in case that the first display panel and the second display panel are connected to each other,the first protrusion part is moved to an inside of the second concave part, andthe second protrusion part is moved to an inside of the first concave part.

9. The display device of claim 8, wherein in case that the first display panel and the second display panel are connected to each other, the second protrusion part moves to the first concave part, contacts the inclined surface of the connection part, and applies a force to the control part such that the control part is moved in the direction.

10. The display device of claim 9, wherein in case that the first display panel and the second display panel are connected to each other, each of the first and second side frames is moved toward a corresponding one of the first and second cabinets.
11. The display device of claim 5, wherein a thickness of the second protrusion part is greater than that of the second side frame.

12. The display device of claim 4, wherein the first concave part includes:a moving part;a first control part;a connection part; anda second control part, whereinthe moving part is movable in a direction,the first control part is fastened to the moving part to control movement of the moving part,the connection part is connected to the first side frame to be movable in another direction different from the direction,the second control part is fastened to the connection part to control movement of the connection part, andeach of the first control part and the second control part includes a spring having elasticity.
13. The display device of claim 12, wherein a thickness of the second protrusion part is equal to a thickness of the second side frame.

14. The display device of claim 12, wherein in case that the first display panel and the second display panel are connected to each other, the second protrusion part moves to the moving part and applies a force to the moving part such that the first control part is moved in the direction.

15. The display device of claim 14, wherein the connection part and the second control part are moved in another direction different from the direction in case that the first control part is moved in the direction.
16. The display device of claim 2, whereinthe first cabinet is smaller than the first display panel, andthe first side frame has a stepped shape.

17. The display device of claim 16, wherein the first concave part includes:a connection part;a moving part; anda control part, whereinthe connection part is connected to the first side frame,the connection part includes a third protrusion part protruding toward the second side frame,the moving part is connected to the connection part,the control part is fastened to the moving part to control movement of the moving part, andthe control part includes a spring having elasticity.

18. The display device of claim 17, whereinthe second protrusion part protrudes toward the third protrusion part and the moving part, andthe moving part includes an inclined surface corresponding to the second protrusion part.

19. The display device of claim 18, wherein in case that the first display panel and the second display panel are connected to each other, the second protrusion part contacts the third protrusion part and the inclined surface of the moving part and moves the control part in a direction through pressure fastening between the second protrusion part and the moving part.
20. The display device of claim 19, wherein each of the first side frame and the second side frame is moved toward a corresponding one of the first and second cabinets.
